snippet.title: Whispering Waters: Behind the Scenes of the Making of "La vaguelette" | Genshin Impact
snippet.description:
"As the dancing water flows, so too we would live. The city it would nourish — and you too, my dear, would flourish."
By playing out a drama within a drama, Furina brings a hitherto unknown "story" into the light.
Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought "La vaguelette" to life!

Download FREE: https://hoyo.link/d0vPBBAd
